name: Masquerave! - Part 1
description:
Masquerave!

Join your friends on a quest for a night of fun in this first installment of Masquerave!

Get to know your friends Nef, Bill, and Hilly while you navigate the city streets of Isulstad, the City of Hope, in this new fantasy RPG from the Wolrd of Myriah.

Masquerave! serves as part of the prologue for our game Tears of Tetricala released in August 2022. We will be integrating the games together in the coming months for a more complete experience, as we switch from the Twine engine Harlowe to Sugarcube which Masquerave! was made on.

Game Developed by Kaptain Viciorious Grimoire (Instagram: @kaptainviciorious)

Narrative Designer Konrad Hughes @ https://konradhughes.com/

Art made by Ai Daive (Instagram: @fantastisktaiart) 

With the aid of @Nightcafestudios ai generators

Music and Sound effects are free from Pixabay and Mixkit

We are happy to have taken part in Interactive Fiction Jam 2 for this project!
